channel.title: Farrar, Straus and Giroux on
channel.description: Recent content in Farrar, Straus and Giroux on

item.title: Annals of the Former World
item.description: I’m glad I’m not beyond the age where books I read can change the way I see the world. If that is an age you can reach, I don’t want to.

item.title: The Dawn of Everything
item.description: One would do well to read up on Graeber’s [[notes/what’s the point if we can’t have fun|theory of playfulness]]. I’d add C.
